title: *PATREON PREVIEW* Father Stretch My Cheeks
description:
Rally ‘round the family with a pocket full of jawnz! Ahead of Throwing Fit’s celebratory feast at Carbone, the Core Four link up to cut another psychotic boyz only for our best friends on Patreon. We’re vibe checking Chef’s crib, debating the cultural pendulum swinging between NYC and LA, going deep on our favorite Bravo shows, telling the story of Jimmy meeting Pop Smoke, breaking down Larry’s NBA All Star weekend FOMO, arguing whether Chuck is ready to be third mic, ethering Mike Bloomberg into oblivion, filling everyone in on the pod’s live show and touring plans, raging with vs. against the machine and, most importantly, reacting in real time to Chuck’s Carbone fit reveal.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
